posts.cooked: Been donating for years but had to drop the amount this year. I want to increase it back to where it was eventually though.

Telcos are awful. Their phone and texting services is garbage: insecure since the inception with no innovation whatsoever, prone to spoofing which facilitates devastating phishing attack every day, leaks handset location to third parties around the world, and overcharges SMS so much that 43% of Signal infrastructure costs is spent on registration fees.

that was my exact thought processâ€¦i was also thinking about telling all friends that are not on Signal that if they installed I would gift them a badge. But perhaps buying them a beer (or six) IRL would generate better results.

Long but interesting read. Love the transparency.

One request: I wish there were a lower minimum donation amount and / or a yearly donation option. I realize charge processing fees are a barrier to accepting small monthly donations, so the yearly option helps get around that.
